data.title: Train “La Robla Express”
data.text:
The Expreso de La Robla gives you the opportunity to travel on a vintage train, knowing Green Spain, at an affordable price.

Get to know the North of Spain known as Green Spain in a classic train with the longing for the great myths but modern, restored and adapted to our time, with all the technical and technological advances, emulating the classicism and glamor of El Transcantábrico, for Many are considered the little brother of El Transcantábrico.

Classic train with the longing for the great myths but modern, restored and adapted to our time, with all the technical and technological advances, emulating the classicism and glamor of El Transcantábrico, for many it is considered as the little brother of El Transcantábrico.

Every morning breakfast will be carried out on board the train, which will coincide with the start-up of the train, so that the pleasure of breakfast is intensified with the spectacular landscapes of Green Spain.

A train made for the enjoyment and pleasure of traveling and contemplate from its large windows the beautiful landscape through which it runs. The train will remain stopped during the nights in the stations so that they can leave and enter when they like and fall asleep.

On board services:

Special menus: If the client needs to follow a special meal regime, it must be requested when making your reservation.

Travel insurance: It is recommended to take out travel insurance, you can hire it with us, indicate it when booking.

Medical service: There is a first aid kit on board the train. The Transcantábrico, Tren Al Andalus and Expreso de La Robla are coordinated with the different health centers of the places through which this trip runs.

The trip includes: The nights of accommodation on board the train indicated in the selected itinerary. Dinners and meals with typical cuisine (includes wines and coffees), indicated on the selected itinerary. Breakfast on board the train with free Buffet, indicated in the selected itinerary. Scheduled excursions with tickets and visits included. Coach that accompanies the train throughout the itinerary. Daily press and magazines. Security Service. Multilingual guide throughout the tour. An excellent team at your disposal.
